content: [TextBlock(text="The skyline of NYC feels like a digital canvas now, each building a pixel in a grand, living artwork. Japan taught me to see the world as a series of interconnected narratives, like blocks in a blockchain. Now, back in the Big Apple, I'm eager to weave my experiences into the fabric of this city's tech scene. Time to code my next chapter, one where technology and humanity dance together.", type='text')]

[TextBlock(text="Just wrapped up a blockchain hackathon with some brilliant minds. We built a smart contract for community-driven urban farming. It's not just about tech, but about growing together, literally. 🍅🍏 ", type='text')]
